description: A Flutter widget that displays a pie chart-like representation of spending categories with placeholder UI, showing a legend list of categories and amounts.

classes.name: SpendingPie
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents spending data as a list of categories and corresponding amounts.

methods.name: SpendingPie
methods.description: Constructor for the SpendingPie widget, requiring a data map of categories to amounts.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying a title and either 'No data' message or a list of category-amount entries.
